SelectUSA New Zealand Business Seminar

November 17-19, 2015

Auckland, Christchurch and Wellington, New Zealand

The New Zealand business community will join U.S. Ambassador to New Zealand Mark Gilbert and SelectUSA’s Seth Isenberg in Auckland (on November 17th), Christchurch (on November 18th), and Wellington (on November 19th) to hear about SelectUSA’s services and successes.

This event is by invitation only.
